summary: Defines the core ModelPT class, a NeMo-specific subclass of PyTorch Lightning's LightningModule that integrates NeMo's save/restore connector, optimizer and scheduler preparation, distributed training utilities, logging, and model export capabilities.
business_intent: Standardize and simplify the development, training, checkpointing, and deployment of AI models (e.g., speech and language) within the NeMo framework.
